nodes.text: Star Wars Omnibus: Dark Times Volume 2

Omnibus: Dark Times Volume 2 is an Star Wars Omnibus-series trade paperback collecting the Star Wars: Dark Times comic book story arcs Blue Harvest, Out of the Wilderness, Fire Carrier and A Spark Remains. It was released on May 7, 2014. It features two covers: One with Dass Jennir facing the reader with a green lightsaber, and the other with Darth Vader deflecting blaster bolts with his lightsaber.

Jedi Dass Jennir takes a job that attracts the attention of Lord Vader himself! Meanwhile, Jedi Master K'Kruhk tries to shield a group of Padawans from the Empire's hunt for Jedi. Culminating in a confrontation between the Jedi and Darth Vader, the galaxy's dark times continue . . .
